name: s3://eodata/CLMS/bio-geophysical/water_and_ice_cover/clms_wsi_water-ice-cover-s1_europe_utm_60m_daily_v1
browserSearchPath: CLMS Bio-geophysical Parameters, Water Bodies, Water and Ice Cover
collectionDescription: The Water and Ice Cover by Sentinel-1 (WICS1) product provides information about river and lake areas covered by snow-covered or snow-free ice. It is generated in near real-time at European scale, based on synthetic aperture radar data from the Sentinel-1 constellation, with a spatial resolution of 60 m x 60 m. It is available for the period from 2016 to the present. More information here.

layers.longDescription: Water and ice cover classification from Sentinel-1 imagery within water bodies defined by the input water mask. Classes include open water (1), snow-covered or snow-free ice (100), radar limitations such as shadow, layover, or foreshortening (200), and no data (255).

layers.shortDescription: Quality layer for the Water/Ice Cover (WIC) layer
layers.longDescription: Quality layer providing basic assessment of the Water/Ice Cover layer.

The default visualisation highlights inland water surfaces over which the water/ice classification is performed; these correspond to pixels where bit 15 is activated. Additional information can also be visualised by selecting other bits. More details are available in the </> Custom option.
